location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letters of recommendation for Residency staff members, written by Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident of the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Copies of letters of recommendation for the Residency accountant, superintendent, two extra clerks, Arabic secretary, Persian secretary, shroff (money-changer), and apothecary, on the event of the impending departure of Hennell from the Residency.
